ul.li: The data policy. Tell me about data policies
The Data Processing Function. Tell me about DPFs
A utility function for manually ingesting data. How do I manually ingest data?

conbody.p: No connection information is specified in data source configuration. Data is "pushed" from the site that is submitting the data. The submitting system initiates a session on a designated port, on which listens. extracts any necessary connection information from the session information. How do I submit data to ?
